QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, n.note_date, n.encid, 'sds_term:' + isnull(n.sds_term, '') + 'sds_location:' + isnull(n.sds_location, '') + 'sds_attribute:' + isnull(n.sds_attribute, '') + ';sds_sentiment:' + isnull(n.sds_sentiment, '') as note_text, 'NLP_SDS' as note_title, n.note_section, 40639387 as language_concept_id from {sc}.nlp_sds n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
